          <title>
            <string language="fr">Expliquer la règle coudée</string>
            <string language="en">Explaining the bent ruler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklären des verbogenen Tabellierprogramms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicando a régua curvada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione del righello piegato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξήγηση του καμμμένου κυβερνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explicar la regla doblada</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment la réfraction  fait que la règle semble coudée.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how refraction makes the ruler appear bent.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">règle coudée</string>
            <string language="en">bent ruler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">refraction in water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Brechung das 
Tabellierprogramm verbogen aussehen läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o refraction faz a 
régua parecer curvada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come la rifrazione 
incita il righello a sembrare piegato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η διάθλαση κάνει 
τον κυβερνήτη να εμφανιστεί καμμμένο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la refracción 
hace que el regla aparece doblado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verbogenes Tabellierprogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung im Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
